channel.title: android on Vilmantas Jakniūnas Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in android on Vilmantas Jakniūnas Portfolio

item.title: Stack Clone
item.description: Description Stack is a very popular android game where player has to click the screen when block is over the pillar. Part of the block which is not over the pillar, gets cut off and new, smaller, block is spawned in old block’s place. Features Tap the screen to place the block Split block into two parts, one part which stays on the pillar and other which falls. Display high-score.

item.title: Flappy Bird Clone
item.description: Description Flappy bird was a very popular mobile game when I was in still in school, so now, when I learned more about game development, I wanted to recreate it. Features Tap the screen to add force to the bird. End game when bird hits a pipe or ground. Display current and highest scores. Acknowledgments Dong Nguyen Flappy Bird
